text:
Hi, maybe my question is related to this channel.
Thanks

Hey Christian - I don’t think this is possible, iframes usually cannot affect the parent page.  However a link to the deal would have this effect - you could link to it from your success message inside the iframe, so have a button that says “Continue” that links to the deal maybe?

oh nice <@U01FBLN056F>
I will make a test in that way.
Thank you
